name: Athos
desc: Autumn's "husband" and a former owner of the Grocery. He killed the jeweler Brandt because he used underhanded methods to destroy Athos's stall.

customize.name: Autumn
customize.desc: Benoit Leroy's adopted daughter. She is also known as Morticia.

customize.text: Athos's "wife." They escaped the Fortress of Meropide to take revenge on her father.

customize.name: Rouge
customize.desc: A member of a group who punishes and robs other Treasure Hoarders to redistribute to those in need.

customize.name: Benoit Leroy
customize.desc: Autumn's adoptive father, who gave his daughter in marriage to a rich man for the sake of money.

customize.name: Athos's Confession
customize.desc:
[Version 1]

A clear bottle with a note that contains events from the life of someone named Athos and a strange drawing on the back.

[Version 2]

A clear bottle with a note that contains events from the life of someone named Athos and a strange drawing on the back. You followed the clues on the paper and found the treasure they left behind.
